attributes.additional_details:
Vaccination has always been controversial.
There are many known, and probably many unknown
harmful side-effects including death.
 Drug companies who promote their vaccines have great
influence over  the conventional medical profession.
 The best policy is to strengthen  the immune system using
natural methods without harmful side effects.
 Vaccines should only be used as a last desperate
measure e.g. against biological warfare.
( There is a separate petition to ban the use of mercury in vaccines.)
